resources.string: Join the numbers to get to the 2048 tile!

All play statistics are cumulative across all games played. They include:

Best Score - Your highest score from any game. 

Total Score - Your total cumulative score across all completed games. 

Top Tile - The highest value tile that you have reached. 

Additional statistics are revealed as higher value tiles are unlocked beginning with 512: 

Games Reached - Total games for which you reached this tile. (Note, reaching the same tile value multiple times within a single game only counts as one.) 

 Shortest Time - Your shortest time to reaching a tile.

Fewest Moves - Your shortest moves to reaching a tile.
Simply move the tiles by swiping on the board. Two tiles with the same number merge when they touch. Reach the 2048 tile to win!

Swiping up, down, left, or right moves tiles in the direction swiped. Tiles with the same number will merge. All other tiles will move across any open space on the board. A new tile will be added to the board with each swipe. New tiles will be numbered 2 or 4.

Reach the 2048 tile to win the game. The challenge continues as you reach even higher number tiles. The game ends when the board fills up and you can\'t make any more moves. The game will be paused and saved whenever you leave the board or exit the app.
See your detailed game stats by tapping Statistics on the home screen or on either score button above the game board.
On the home screen you can toggle the Sounds, Undo, and Swipe Anywhere features on/off with a tap. Swipe Anywhere enabled players to swipe anywhere on the screen (not just on the board).
This is an unofficial mobile version of 2048, created by Carol Musyoka.
Don\'t hesitate in Time trial play. The tiles won\'t wait for your move before they appear. Survive as long as you can. The game is over when the board fills up!
Uses open-source assets by Qat, vitriolix, Breviceps, qubodup, and kwahmah_02 from freesound.org.
